com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.cache

Class CacheUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.upstream.cache.CacheUtil

  • public final class CacheUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Caching related utility methods.

      Generates a cache key out of the given Uri.

    • Method Detail

      • generateKey

        public static java.lang.String generateKey(android.net.Uri uri)
        Generates a cache key out of the given Uri.
        Parameters:
        uri - Uri of a content which the requested key is for.

      • getKey

        public static java.lang.String getKey(DataSpec dataSpec)
        Returns the dataSpec.key if not null, otherwise generates a cache key out of dataSpec.uri
        Parameters:
        dataSpec - Defines a content which the requested key is for.

      • getCached

        public static void getCached(DataSpec dataSpec,
                             Cache cache,
                             CacheUtil.CachingCounters counters)
        Sets a CacheUtil.CachingCounters to contain the number of bytes already downloaded and the length for the content defined by a dataSpec. CacheUtil.CachingCounters.newlyCachedBytes is reset to 0.
        Parameters:
        dataSpec - Defines the data to be checked.
        cache - A Cache which has the data.
        counters - The CacheUtil.CachingCounters to update.

      • cache

        public static void cache(DataSpec dataSpec,
                         Cache cache,
                         DataSource upstream,
                         CacheUtil.CachingCounters counters)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        Caches the data defined by dataSpec, skipping already cached data. Caching stops early if the end of the input is reached.
        Parameters:
        dataSpec - Defines the data to be cached.
        cache - A Cache to store the data.
        upstream - A DataSource for reading data not in the cache.
        counters - Counters to update during caching.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs reading from the source.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread was interrupted.

      • cache

        public static void cache(DataSpec dataSpec,
                         Cache cache,
                         CacheDataSource dataSource,
                         byte[] buffer,
                         PriorityTaskManager priorityTaskManager,
                         int priority,
                         CacheUtil.CachingCounters counters,
                         boolean enableEOFException)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        Caches the data defined by dataSpec while skipping already cached data. Caching stops early if end of input is reached and enableEOFException is false.
        Parameters:
        dataSpec - Defines the data to be cached.
        cache - A Cache to store the data.
        dataSource - A CacheDataSource that works on the cache.
        buffer - The buffer to be used while caching.
        priorityTaskManager - If not null it's used to check whether it is allowed to proceed with caching.
        priority - The priority of this task. Used with priorityTaskManager.
        counters - Counters to update during caching.
        enableEOFException - Whether to throw an EOFException if end of input has been reached unexpectedly.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs reading from the source.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread was interrupted.

      • readAndDiscard

        private static long readAndDiscard(DataSpec dataSpec,
                                   long absoluteStreamPosition,
                                   long length,
                                   DataSource dataSource,
                                   byte[] buffer,
                                   PriorityTaskManager priorityTaskManager,
                                   int priority,
                                   CacheUtil.CachingCounters counters)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        Reads and discards all data specified by the dataSpec.
        Parameters:
        dataSpec - Defines the data to be read. absoluteStreamPosition and length fields are overwritten by the following parameters.
        absoluteStreamPosition - The absolute position of the data to be read.
        length - Length of the data to be read, or C.LENGTH_UNSET if it is unknown.
        dataSource - The DataSource to read the data from.
        buffer - The buffer to be used while downloading.
        priorityTaskManager - If not null it's used to check whether it is allowed to proceed with caching.
        priority - The priority of this task.
        counters - Counters to be set during reading.
        Returns:
        Number of read bytes, or 0 if no data is available because the end of the opened range has been reached.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • remove

        public static void remove(Cache cache,
                          java.lang.String key)
        Removes all of the data in the cache pointed by the key.
